title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Examples behavior contributes positive environment community include: Demonstrating empathy kindness toward people respectful differing opinions, viewpoints, experiences Giving gracefully accepting constructive feedback Accepting responsibility apologizing affected mistakes, learning experience Focusing best just us individuals, overall community Examples unacceptable behavior include: use sexualized language imagery, sexual attention advances kind Trolling, insulting derogatory comments, personal political attacks Public private harassment Publishing others’ private information, physical email address, without explicit permission conduct reasonably considered inappropriate professional setting

title: Cause-of-death code checks
text: codes used cause--death specific coding structure depends ICD version used. ICD-10, codes following structure: Alphanumeric 3 - 5 characters Character 1 alpha (letters except U used) Character 2 numeric remaining 5 characters may combination alpha/numeric Use decimal 3 characters Alpha characters case-sensitive ICD-11, codes following structure: Alphanumeric characters Character 1 range characters 1 - 9 X except letters O used prevent confusion numbers 1 0 Character 2 alpha Character 3 numeric Character 4 alphanumeric ranging 0-9 -Z except letters O used prevent confusion numbers 1 0 functions cod_check_code_structure_icd10() cod_check_code_structure_icd11() performs appropriate heuristics checking structure cause--death codes based ICD version outputs data.frame numeric check code field character string check code note field. Given multiple structural errors/issues cause--death code structure can simultaneously exist, check code represents combination possible errors. Following different check codes check code notes:

what: Perform checks on existing input data for CoDEdit tool
title: Implementing Cause-of-Death Data Checks with codeditr
text: Using icd10_example dataset dataset already formatted compatible structure required CoDEdit tool, can perform check dataset see possible issues formatting structure using CoDEdit tool. result data.frame columns check codes check notes four types check performed data. Check input sex CoDEdit tool requires sex provided value 1 males value 2 females. input value sex use format, check output note saying sex value missing. Check input age CoDEdit tool requires age recorded two values - age value age type. Age value integer value age based age type can either days (D), months (M), years (Y). check uses heuristic determining age value age type combination provided input data appropriate input CoDEdit. Check code low level check cause--death code performed basically checks whether values cause--death code missing . Date death code low level check date death performed basically checks whether values date death missing .

title: Calculate age at death based on date of birth and date of death — cod_calculate_age
text: dob Date birth. ideally standard ISO extended date format "YYYY-MM-DD" specified default value date_format. dod Date death. ideally standard ISO extended date format YYYY-MM_DD" specified default value date_format. date_format Format date values provided. Date formatting handled using strptime() hence needs specified based strptime() requires format argument. default, set standard ISO extended date format expressed "%Y-%m-%d" corresponds "YYYY-MM-DD". codedit Logical. output based CoDEdit version 2 coding rules. Default TRUE.

title: Calculate age at death based on date of birth and date of death — cod_calculate_age
text: Values age days, months years. codedit TRUE, tibble age value age type required CoDEdit.
